title: Options Greeks Calculator (Delta, Gamma, Theta, Vega)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Delta: \(\Delta = \frac{\partial C}{\partial S}\) Gamma: \(\Gamma = \frac{\partial^2 C}{\partial S^2}\) Theta: \(\Theta = \frac{\partial C}{\partial t}\) Vega: \(\nu = \frac{\partial C}{\partial \sigma}\)
